original: 3.3.2. Atītavāra🔽Yo cakkhāyatanaṁ parijānittha so sotāyatanaṁ parijānitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: atītavāra  yaḥ cakkhāyatanam parijānittha so sotāyatanam parijānittha ati āmantā
translated: … The past section🔽Has anyone who has fully understood the eye-sphere also fully understood the ear-sphere? Yes.

original: Yo vā pana sotāyatanaṁ parijānittha so cakkhāyatanaṁ parijānitthāti? Āmantā.🔽Yo cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānittha so sotāyatanaṁ na parijānitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana sota āyatanam parijānittha so cakkhu āyatanam parijānittha ati āmantā  yaḥ cakkhāyatanam na parijānittha so sotāyatanam na parijānittha ati āmantā
translated: Or has anyone who has fully understood the ear-sphere also fully understood the eye-sphere? Yes.🔽Has anyone who has not fully understood the eye-sphere not fully understood the ear-sphere? Yes.

original: Yo vā pana sotāyatanaṁ na parijānittha so cakkhāyatanaṁ na parijānitthāti? Āmantā.
analyzed: yaḥ vā pana sotāyatanam na parijānittha so cakkhāyatanam na parijānittha ati āmantā
translated: Or has anyone who has not fully understood the ear-sphere not fully understood the eye-sphere? Yes.
